languages.text: {n}Улыбка Инцендии становится хищной.{/n} "Я люблю искренность. Когда стоящий перед трибуналом человек сам признает, что разделяет убеждения того, кто скоро будет объявлен открытым мятежником и предателем Империума... Такое покаяние заслуживает быстрой и не слишком болезненной казни".

{n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка Инцендии становится хищной.{/n} "Я люблю искренность. Когда стоящий перед трибуналом человек сам признает, что разделяет убеждения того, кто скоро будет объявлен открытым мятежником и предателем Империума... Такое покаяние заслуживает быстрой и не слишком болезненной казни".

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅的笑容充满了恶意。{/n}“我真欣赏你的坦率。如果有谁站在我的法庭里，公开宣称{mf|他|她}愿意支持某个彻头彻尾的无政府主义者，愿意与帝国的叛徒狼狈为奸……我认为这样的公开宣称，只会让{mf|他|她}接下来的行刑过程充满了痛苦与折磨。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅的笑容充满了恶意。{/n}“我真欣赏你的坦率。如果有谁站在我的法庭里，公开宣称{mf|他|她}愿意支持某个彻头彻尾的无政府主义者，愿意与帝国的叛徒狼狈为奸……我认为这样的公开宣称，只会让{mf|他|她}接下来的行刑过程充满了痛苦与折磨。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの笑顔は意地悪な表情へと変わる。{/n}「私は素直さが好きだ。法廷に立つ者が無政府主義者で帝国の裏切り者と同じ信念を共有していると、そう公の場で認めたら…恐らくその者は、迅速かつ痛みの少ない死刑が与えられるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの笑顔は意地悪な表情へと変わる。{/n}「私は素直さが好きだ。法廷に立つ者が無政府主義者で帝国の裏切り者と同じ信念を共有していると、そう公の場で認めたら…恐らくその者は、迅速かつ痛みの少ない死刑が与えられるだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa de Incendia se vuelve violenta.{/n} «Me encanta la sinceridad. Cuando el que se presenta ante el tribunal admite abiertamente que comparte las creencias de alguien que está a punto de ser declarado anarquista y traidor al Imperium... Desde mi punto de vista, tal confesión debería valerle una ejecución rápida y menos agonizante».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa de Incendia se vuelve violenta.{/n} «Me encanta la sinceridad. Cuando el que se presenta ante el tribunal admite abiertamente que comparte las creencias de alguien que está a punto de ser declarado anarquista y traidor al Imperium... Desde mi punto de vista, tal confesión debería valerle una ejecución rápida y menos agonizante».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendias Lächeln wird bösartig.{/n} "Ehrlichkeit ist so erfrischend. Wenn {mf|der|die} Angeklagte offen gesteht, die Überzeugungen eines Verbrechers zu teilen, der gerade zum Anarchisten und Verräter am Imperium verurteilt werden soll ... Ich sage, ein solches Verständnis sollte durch eine schnelle und weniger qualvolle Hinrichtung belohnt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendias Lächeln wird bösartig.{/n} "Ehrlichkeit ist so erfrischend. Wenn {mf|der|die} Angeklagte offen gesteht, die Überzeugungen eines Verbrechers zu teilen, der gerade zum Anarchisten und Verräter am Imperium verurteilt werden soll ... Ich sage, ein solches Verständnis sollte durch eine schnelle und weniger qualvolle Hinrichtung belohnt werden."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Le sourire d'Incendia se fait menaçant.{/n} « J'aime tellement la franchise. Quand quelqu'un avoue devant la cour qu'il partage les croyances d'une personne sur le point d'être déclarée anarchiste et traître à l'Imperium... À mon sens, une telle confession mérite une exécution rapide et sans douleur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire d'Incendia se fait menaçant.{/n} « J'aime tellement la franchise. Quand quelqu'un avoue devant la cour qu'il partage les croyances d'une personne sur le point d'être déclarée anarchiste et traître à l'Imperium... À mon sens, une telle confession mérite une exécution rapide et sans douleur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın gülümsemesi vahşileşiyor.{/n} "Açık sözlülükten hoşlanırım. Mahkemeye çıkmış biri, direkt olarak anarşist ve İmparatorluk haini olmakla itham edilmek üzere olan birinin inançlarını paylaştığını açık ve net bir şekilde itiraf ettiğinde... Böylesi bir itiraf karşılığında ona hızlı ve acısız bir idam armağan edilmelidir derim."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia's smile turns vicious.{/n} "I do so enjoy candour. When the one who stands before the court admits openly that {mf|he|she} shares the beliefs of someone about to be pronounced an outright anarchist and traitor to the Imperium... I say such a confession should earn {mf|him|her} a swift and less agonising execution."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın gülümsemesi vahşileşiyor.{/n} "Açık sözlülükten ben de hoşlanırım. Mahkemenin karşısında duran biri, direkt olarak anarşist ve İmparatorluk haini olmakla itham edilmek üzere olan birinin inançlarını paylaştığını açık ve net bir şekilde itiraf ettiğinde... Ben de derim ki, böylesi bir itiraf karşılığında, ona hızlı ve acısız bir idam armağan edilmelidir."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
